before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"34sq7","text":"Prepare DMEM/10%FBS stock","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e10a7","text":"Prepare 0.5M EDTA stock","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcljb","text":"Prepare 1mL PBS/0.05% BSA per sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c570c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9k9o5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1so06","text":"Note: Our samples are retrieved from the OR immediately upon removal from patient and transported to pathology. The pathologist grossly examines the sample and provides 100-200mg transverse tissue segments from the isthmus, ampulla and fimbriae of the fallopian tube and a longitudinal segment from the center of the ovary. Tissue segments are transported to the lab in DMEM/10% FBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"97qsr","text":"This protocol provides a procedure for human fallopian tube and ovary dissociation into single cell suspension prior to single cell RNA-sequencing. It involves removing the epithelial fraction and then further digesting the remaining solid tissue fraction to gain maximum yield from all tissue compartments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b3l4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
